title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 211.5 - Age of boxers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 211.5 - Age of boxers

State Regulations

Unless special permission otherwise is granted by the

Commission, boxers under 19 years of age are permitted to box no more than six
rounds; boxers 19 years of age, eight rounds; boxers 20 years of age 10 rounds; and for all bouts over 10 rounds, each boxer in such bout shall be at least 21
years of age. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes

ยง

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
